name: Kokos Rider 3000
description:
Our final project c:

Kokos Rider 3000 is an ocean themed, top down racing game.

Enjoy the funky pixel art we (mostly) did not make! Full credit goes to artists listed below.

Race with other cars and nyoom past them using nitro!

Earn first place in all of the maps!

(Use of Chrome or Firefox recommended)

Pls give us a 5, thanks <3

//Art Sources:

Cars: Mini Pixel Pack 2 - GrafxKid (grafxkid.itch.io)
Map gfx: Four Seasons Platformer Tileset - Rotting Pixels (rottingpixels.itch.io)       Time Fantasy Beach Tiles - FinalBossBlues (finalbossblues.itch.io)
Serene Village revamped - LimeZu (limezu.itch.io)
Menu Simple Keys Asset Pack - beamedeighth (beamedeighth.itch.io)
Beach Background - katemangostar (freepik.com/autor/katemangostar) 
Pixellari font - Zacchary Dempsey-Plante (ztdp.ca)
logo: https://www.thefancytext.com/png-text-generator

+ Special thanks to Handlara for help with some of the custom art <3
